thread.section_title: Lake Victoria Serena Golf Resort & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend break with my husband
thread.title_full: Weekend break with my husband - Review of Lake Victoria Serena Golf Resort & Spa, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Barbara G
title: Weekend break with my husband
text:
We recently spent a weekend here which was so relaxing. We were in an executive suite which looked over the lake and golf course. The rooms were very comfortable and spotless. Breakfast had a very extensive choice and dinner in the citadel restaurant was delicious. The staff were all very friendly and addressed us by name.
We spent a lot of time by the pool which again was very clean and again the staff were very attentive.
We left on Sunday feeling very relaxed and cannot wait to return with our daughter soon.
Next time we will have a boat trip.
Thank you!
